flavorText: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

foreignData.flavorText: Kluge Tüftler räumen hinter sich auf.
foreignData.name: Schrotttaucherschlange
foreignData.text: Die Schrotttaucherschlange ist unblockbar, solange der verteidigende Spieler ein Artefakt kontrolliert.

foreignData.flavorText: Los artífices inteligentes limpian después de irse.
foreignData.name: Serpiente buceachatarra
foreignData.text: La Serpiente buceachatarra es imbloqueable mientras el jugador defensor controle un artefacto.

foreignData.flavorText: Les artificiers intelligents nettoient toujours derrière eux.
foreignData.name: Serpent plonge-ferraille
foreignData.text: Le Serpent plonge-ferraille est imblocable tant que le joueur défenseur contrôle au moins un artefact.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli artefici più intelligenti lasciano pulito.
foreignData.name: Serpe Affondarottami
foreignData.text: La Serpe Affondarottami non può essere bloccata fintanto che il giocatore in difesa controlla un artefatto.

foreignData.name: 屑鉄潜りの海蛇
foreignData.text: 屑鉄潜りの海蛇は、防御プレイヤーがアーティファクトをコントロールしているかぎりブロックされない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 海蛇

foreignData.flavorText: Os artesãos inteligentes sempre limpam a sujeira remanescente de seus trabalhos.
foreignData.name: Serpente Mergulhadora de Sucata
foreignData.text: Serpente Mergulhadora de Sucata não pode ser bloqueado enquanto o jogador defensor controlar um artefato.

foreignData.name: Ныряющий в Металл Змей
foreignData.text: Ныряющий в Металл Змей не может быть заблокирован, пока защищающийся игрок контролирует артефакт.

foreignData.flavorText: 聪明的神器师会自行清理干净。
foreignData.name: 废铁潜蛇
foreignData.text: 只要防御牌手操控神器，废铁潜蛇就不能被阻挡。

foreignData.flavorText: 聰明的神器師會自行清理乾淨。
foreignData.name: 廢鐵潛蛇
foreignData.text: 只要防禦玩家操控神器，廢鐵潛蛇就不能被阻擋。

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
originalText: Scrapdiver Serpent is unblockable as long as defending player controls an artifact.

rulings.text: Whether Scrapdiver Serpent can be blocked is relevant only as the declare blockers step begins. If the defending player gains control of an artifact after Scrapdiver Serpent has become blocked, the Serpent will remain blocked.

text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
